AI Description: Flye is a long-read assembler designed to assemble genomes using nanopore sequencing data. It aims to provide accurate and high-quality genome assemblies by utilizing long reads.
Core Features: 1. Long-read assembly 2. Utilizes nanopore sequencing data 3. Accurate genome assemblies 4. High-quality output
General Tags: Genome Assembly, Long-Read Sequencing, Nanopore Sequencing
